name: Dassnagar Infosystems
tag_list: social-network, social-media, web-design, web-application, outsource, software-development, web-2-0, myspace, facebook, video, youtube, blog, dating
overview:
Dassnagar Infosystems is an offshore web application development company in India offering diverse tailor made solutions to help organizations around the world. They believe in developing transparent and trusted client relationships where processes and quality management are building blocks for scalable web application development. The company has a web design studio with talented XHTML/CSS 3.0/Actionscript designers and dedicated programming teams in Open source (PHP 5.0/mysql 5.0), Microsoft.Net, Ruby On rails and Java platform. Application development is done in MVC frameworks with GUI design in XHTML.

IT Consulting Services :

* Custom Web Application Development include dating portals, social networks, video broadcasting and sharing, blogs, online marketplaces, auction portals, property rentals with scalable and robust framework.
* XHTML / CSS 3.0 Website Design & Maintenance
* Flash Animations and Actionscripting
* Custom Software Applications - EJB/Servelets/Oracle/VC++
* Embedded Systems / RFID / Hand held software solutions
* Search Engine Optimization SEO & SEM.
